forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
